sn4.6:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn4.6:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattandhakāratimisāyaṃ abbhokāse nisinno hoti, devo ca ekamekaṃ phusāyati.
sn4.6:5.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā bhagavato bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo mahantaṃ sapparājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn4.6:5.8: Seyyathāpi nāma deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatā niccharanti;
sn4.6:5.10: Seyyathāpi nāma kammāragaggariyā dhamamānāya saddo hoti;
sn4.6:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā “māro ayaṃ pāpimā” iti viditvā māraṃ pāpimantaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
sn4.6:8.2: Atho ḍaṃsasarīsapā bahū;
sn4.6:9.1: * Nabhaṃ phaleyya pathavī caleyya,
sn4.6:10.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā “jānāti maṃ bhagavā, jānāti maṃ sugato”ti dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyīti.
